name: Smashed (Sujal)
description:
Smashed is a game made for Dev League Round 2. The theme is Unbeatable.

So I made a game where you have the Smash (beat) houseflies. 

" How many flies to win is not a question, it is how many you are willing to kill"

Controls

Use Mouse to Move

Left click to SMASH!

❤Have fun counting!
